channel.title: Okay seriously need help getting my server online!
channel.description:
can someone please help me get my server online. Maybe someone who has experience with putting servers online for others to play.
well i have portforward and know how to make a webclient the thing is making it online for others to play. i have set the ip to my home ip and people cant connect. i set the ip to no ip and noone can connect so i have no idea what to do!

item.title: Okay seriously need help getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

He said he portforwarded… I also cant connect. I changed public stAtic server = 0.0.0.0 in client.java and i changed the server =
Is there something different i hav to do for the client folder thati give out to public?

Read full topic
item.source: Okay seriously need help getting my server online!

item.title: Okay seriously need help getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Go to your desktop.
Start > Search for ‘CMD’ (A command prompt will appear) > Type in ‘ipconfig’ > Copy the last IP displayed in the command prompt (Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.0.1) > Open up your Internet Connection > Type in that IP in the Adress Bar > Press Enter and your Router Information should display. You should see something like ‘Wireless’ and ‘Portforwarding’.
Everything coming after this is common sence, I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay seriously need help getting my server online!
